title: Bug 120922: "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description: Bug 120922: "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement. Other pages cannot be used until the source is saved. The user needs to figure out how to save or discard their changes. A dialog titled "Error" (including the quotes) is displayed. The dialog contains these options: "Yes" would save the changes, "No" would discard the changes, and "Cancel" would do nothing and remain on the Source page.
EB: A better approach would be to improve the "Dirty Page" behavior in the XML Report Designer editor. The dialog should have a more appropriate title without the quotes. It should clearly indicate that the XML Report Design has been changed.
